Package ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook

Class Summary
ActivityWithPopup Holds common methods used by activities with popups
AddRecipesActivity Used to create new recipes in the local memory called "My Recipes"
BogoPicGen  
BuildConfig  
EditIngredients Used to change or add ingredients in a recipe
EditPhotos This class shows the recipe's pictures in a gallery and allows capturing of new pictures as well as deleting of stored pictures (after pictures have been enlarged in new activity).
EditRecipeActivity Used to Edit a recipe that is locally saved in "My Recipes"
FoodBookApplication Application class -- initiates all needed singletons as well as path variables needed by models and activity classes alike.
FullImageEditPhotosActivity This class is used to view enlarged pictures/images after clicking on them in the edit gallery (activity EditPhotos).
FullImageViewPhotosActivity This class is used to view enlarged pictures/images after clicking on them in the view gallery (activity ViewPhotosActivity).
MainScreen The starting screen for the "FoodBook" app
MyIngredients Displays all of the local users ingredients in a list and gives the option to edit said ingredients
MyRecipes Displays all of the local user's recipes in a list and gives additional options with the recipes
MySimpleArrayAdapter This array adapter is for ingredients.
R  
R.attr  
R.color  
R.dimen  
R.drawable  
R.id  
R.layout  
R.menu  
R.string  
R.style  
SearchActivity Allows the user to search the online database for
SearchResultsActivity Displays what the server has found for search results
TakePhotosActivity This class allows the user to take (capture) pictures and save them onto a recipe.
ViewPhotosActivity This class only shows the recipe's pictures in a gallery.
ViewRecipeActivity Activity launched that presents to the user detailed information about a Recipe.
ViewSearchResultActivity Activity that allows the user to view a recipe that was returned from a search result, and subsequently delete the recipe from the search results or download that recipe
